Text:
So you downloaded this torrent, that has been running for more than a year, and currently has more than 30 seeders: 
https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5884017/The_Inbetweeners_S01_DVDRip_XviD-REWARD

Then you deleted 5 of the 6 subtitle SRT files that was included in it, and uploaded  the rest as your own torrent. 
Shame on you!

You really ought to read this:  http://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=Torrent%20Whore
